CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Interestingly , the trend observed in the PCE values differed from that of optical behavior of the PBDTT-DPP-TPD in terms of the DPP to TPD ratio , showing nonlinear compositional dependence from 2 to 6% .

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the "Material Name" entities in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table with one column "Material Name":

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PCE |
| PBDTT-DPP-TPD |
| DPP |
| TPD |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Of course! Here are the valid "Material Name" entities in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table with one column "Material Name":

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PCE |
| PBDTT-DPP-TPD |

I have removed the following entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name":

* "Interestingly" (this is an adverb that modifies the verb "observed")
* "nonlinear" (this is an adjective that describes the compositional dependence)
* "from 2 to 6%" (this is a range of values)

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Interestingly , the trend observed in the PCE values differed from that of optical behavior of the PBDTT-DPP-TPD in terms of the DPP to TPD ratio , showing nonlinear compositional dependence from 2 to 6% .

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the "Property Name" entities in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table with one column "Property Name":

| Property Name |
| --- |
| PCE (Polymeric Coefficient of Expansion) |
| optical behavior of the PBDTT-DPP-TPD (optical properties of the polymer blend) |
| DPP to TPD ratio (ratio of DPP to TPD molecular weights) |
| compositional dependence (dependence of optical properties on composition) |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any questions.
